pylayers.antprop.antenna.Antenna.info¶

Antenna.info()[source]¶

gives info about antenna object

>>> A1 = Antenna('trx1','defant.trx')
>>> A2 = Antenna('vsh3','defant.vsh3')
>>> A3 = Antenna('mat','S1R1.mat','ant/UWBAN/Matfile')
